5.1.2. The Effectiveness of Attention Gate 

Next, we conduct experiments using two backbones, ResNet101 and ResNeSt101, 

integrated with the Attention Gate (AG) module. The integrated models are 

called Attention ResNet101-UNet and Attention ResUNeSt101-UNet, respec-

tively.

Next, we compare AG-CUResNeSt-101 against UNet and MultiResUNet [40] 

in Scenario 5, i.e., 5-fold cross-validation on the CVC-Clinic dataset. Results 

are shown in Table 5. Note that the authors of UNet and MultiResUNet only re-

ported their IoU scores on this dataset. Regardless, we can see AG-CUResNeSt-

101 shows significant improvement in this metric, outperforming MultiResUNet 

by almost 5%, and UNet by 10%.
